channel.title: Full Metalst-Scape Client
channel.description:
I have just thought about something... Why not make a client?
The client base is ddsspeced, and so that I didn't leech it, I kept the background pic, and that's also because when I try to change the pic a black screen pops up lol.
I will make the following in my client:
[ul][li]Models[/li] [li]New background[/li] [li]Fix nulls[/li][/ul]
~~~~~~~~~~ [u][b]Completion[/b][/u]:
Finished Not done ~~~~~~~~~~ Models New background Fix nulls ~~~~~~~~~~ As soon as the client's done, I'll be posting pics. ~~~~~~~~~~ Client Completion:
[b]||||||||||[/b]

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape Client
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Oh ok wolfs goal.

And not to brown nose or anything, but Hidendra’s right. That topic got locked because you didn’t post a pic/vid, and you broke the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape Client
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

i am…its just…why make a new client…just use an old one make new models and st00f and give creds to creator…start out with small projects instead of large ones…

Read full topic

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape Client
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

wolfs goal:

yea, but its not that…everything i post gets locked…even my 508 server download…it got locked because my work is “unbelieveable” but i work in a development team…

because you did not post pics/vids as the sectional rules say. if it was finished you would have no problems whatsoever showing them.
Also stop hijacking.

Read full topic

item.title: Full Metalst-Scape Client
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Well, the Mods on this forum have high standards, and don’t

spoonfeed
(from m.dog311)

So, expect most of ur topics to get locked, because my error TuT got locked for lack of common sense or something like that. It was one of my best TuTs too.

And if u hate the rules on this forum, then go on http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php and post TuTs on there, they accept copy and paste TuTs.

Read full topic
